channel.title: [pi] Tokens help please!

item.title: [pi] Tokens help please!
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

Okay so i’m playing around with quest and making my own custom tut island and the token i added in the char file is tut = 0
but how would i get it too update to like 1 or more after i’m done talking to a npc?
this is what i have

case 945: if (c.tut == 0) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(21, i); c.tut = 1; } break;

Read full topic
